Html:
Hello. 

I have some problems with trying to use AsioOut. It won't stop on the en of stream is ended and continue to play last sound. Looped!  it's sounds terrible! :(  

Can i do something with it? 

Thanks for help

I'm afraid ASIO support is very much in alpha state at the moment. It only works on a few soundcards. If you load the source of NAudio into VisualStudio you might be able to debug it and find out what is going wrong.

Mark
